verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8085><s%>, Hear, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> which I speak <S%H1696><s%> in your ears <S%H241><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>, that you may learn <S%H3925><s%> them <S%H8104><s%>, and keep, and do them <S%H6213><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with us in Horeb <S%H2722><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> not this covenant <S%H1285><s%> with our fathers <S%H1><s%>, but with us <S%H587><s%>, even us <S%H428><s%>, who are all of us here alive <S%H2416><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> with you face <S%H6440><s%> to face <S%H6440><s%> in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>,

(I stood <S%H5975><s%> between the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and you at that time <S%H6256><s%>, to show <S%H5046><s%> you the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: for you were afraid <S%H3372><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>, and went not up <S%H5927><s%> into the mountain <S%H2022><s%> <S%H99999><s%>;) saying,
I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, which brought you out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>.
You shall have none other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> before me <S%H6440><s%>.

You shall not make <S%H6213><s%> you any engraved image <S%H6459><s%>, or any likeness <S%H8544><s%> of any thing that is in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>, or that is in the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath <S%H4325><s%>, or that is in the waters beneath the earth <S%H776><s%>:

You shall not bow down <S%H7812><s%> yourself unto them <S%H5647><s%>, nor serve them <S%H3068><s%>: for I the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God <S%H410><s%>, visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> upon the sons <S%H1121><s%> unto the third <S%H8029><s%> and fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation of them that hate me <S%H8130><s%>,
And showing <S%H6213><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> unto thousands <S%H505><s%> of them that love <S%H157><s%> me and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%>.

You shall not take <S%H5375><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>: for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will not hold him guiltless <S%H5352><s%> that takes <S%H5375><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> it <S%H3068><s%>, as the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded you <S%H6680><s%>.
Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall labor <S%H5647><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> all your work <S%H4399><s%>:

But the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: in it you shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%>, you <S%H1121><s%>, nor your son, nor your daughter <S%H1323><s%>, nor your manservant <S%H5650><s%>, nor your maidservant <S%H519><s%>, nor your ox <S%H7794><s%>, nor your donkey <S%H2543><s%>, nor any of your cattle <S%H929><s%>, nor your stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is inside your gates <S%H8179><s%>; that your manservant <S%H5650><s%> and your maidservant <S%H519><s%> may rest as well as you <S%H5117><s%>.

And remember <S%H2142><s%> that you were a servant <S%H5650><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out there through a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and by a stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>: therefore the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you to keep <S%H6213><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

Honor <S%H3513><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> and your mother <S%H517><s%>, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H3117><s%>; that your days may be prolonged <S%H748><s%>, and that it may go well <S%H3190><s%> with you <S%H127><s%>, in the land which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you <S%H5414><s%>.
You shall not kill <S%H7523><s%>.
Neither shall you commit adultery <S%H5003><s%>.
Neither shall you steal <S%H1589><s%>.
Neither shall you bear <S%H6030><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>.

Neither shall you desire <S%H2530><s%> your neighbour <S%H7453><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>, neither shall you covet <S%H183><s%> your neighbour <S%H7453><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, his field <S%H7704><s%>, or his manservant <S%H5650><s%>, or his maidservant <S%H519><s%>, his ox <S%H7794><s%>, or his donkey <S%H2543><s%>, or any thing that is your neighbour <S%H7453><s%>'s.

These words <S%H1697><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto all your assembly <S%H6951><s%> in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>, of the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and of the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%>, with a great <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>: and he added no more <S%H3254><s%>. And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> them in two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, and delivered them unto me <S%H5414><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H8085><s%>, when you heard the voice <S%H6963><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the darkness <S%H2822><s%>, (for the mountain <S%H2022><s%> did burn <S%H1197><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>,) that you came near <S%H7126><s%> unto me <S%H7218><s%>, even all the heads of your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, and your elders <S%H2205><s%>;

And you said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H3068><s%>, the Lord our God <S%H430><s%> has showed <S%H7200><s%> us his glory <S%H3519><s%> and his greatness <S%H1433><s%>, and we have heard <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>: we have seen <S%H7200><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> does talk <S%H1696><s%> with man <S%H120><s%>, and he lives <S%H2425><s%>.

Now therefore why should we die <S%H4191><s%>? for this great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> will consume <S%H398><s%> us <S%H8085><s%>: if we hear the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> any more <S%H3254><s%>, then we shall die <S%H4191><s%>.

For who is there of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, that has heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H430><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>, as we have <S%H2421><s%>, and lived?

Go you near <S%H7126><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> all that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>: and speak <S%H1696><s%> you unto us all that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto you <S%H8085><s%>; and we will hear it <S%H6213><s%>, and do it.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your words <S%H1697><s%>, when you spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto me <S%H3068><s%>; and the Lord said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H8085><s%>, I have heard the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the words <S%H1697><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%>, which they have spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto you <S%H3190><s%>: they have well said all that they have spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

O that there were such <S%H2088><s%> an <S%H4310><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> in them <S%H5414><s%>, that they would fear <S%H3372><s%> me <S%H8104><s%>, and keep all my commandments <S%H4687><s%> always <S%H3117><s%>, that it might be well <S%H3190><s%> with them <S%H1121><s%>, and with their sons for ever <S%H5769><s%>!
Go <S%H3212><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to them <S%H7725><s%>, Get you into your tents <S%H168><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>.

But as for you <S%H5975><s%>, stand you here by me <S%H5978><s%>, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%> unto you all the commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the judgments <S%H4941><s%>, which you shall teach <S%H3925><s%> them <S%H6213><s%>, that they may do them in the land <S%H776><s%> which I give <S%H5414><s%> them to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

You shall observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> therefore as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H5493><s%>: you shall not turn aside to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left <S%H8040><s%>.

You shall walk <S%H3212><s%> in all the ways <S%H1870><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H2421><s%>, that you may live, and that it may be well <S%H2895><s%> with you <S%H748><s%>, and that you may prolong your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which you shall possess <S%H3423><s%>.
